title: Formative Assessment-Based Foreign Language Writing Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced foreign language writing proficiency and basic understanding of writing structures
context.additional_context: Real-Time Feedback and Personalized Writing Task Environment Using Digital Devices

learning_goals: Learners can improve the logical coherence of foreign language writing texts by 30% or more by incorporating formative assessment feedback
Learners achieve self-correction capabilities that reduce revision counts by 50% or more in weekly writing assignments
Learners acquire the ability to identify 80% or more of writing errors using peer assessment and AI analysis tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
